staticContent.content:
Here you will find some links to other sites we manage /operate and to other insurances that may be of interest to you.

 

Our core business is Commercial Insurances – That is insurance of virtually all types for most business. Our clients range from firms with turnovers in the hundreds of millions with locations worldwide to a firm with a single principal.

 

Many clients have come on a recommendation or referral and after many years of being our clients, they have become the new source of referral to us. With almost half a century of insurance broking behind, us we tend to know our products and markets!

 

  • Commercial Insurances – Various
  • Link to Office or Surgery Insurance
  • Malpractice or Professional Indemnity Insurance
  • Personal Accident Insurance
  • Property Owners Insurance
  • Life & Pensions
  • Our US partner broker for clients with North America exposures
staticContent.title: Welcome to the Links Page
